metadata.title: CVE-2018-4130 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.3 isaffected. Safari before 11.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.4 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.7.4 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.3 isaffected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption and application crash) via a crafted web site.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
